title: Employee Profiles
subtitle: View and manage employee details
content: Access and update information related to employee profiles, including contact details, position, and department.

title: Leave Management
subtitle: Submit and track leave requests
content: Learn how to submit and track leave requests for employees. Keep records of approved and pending leaves.

title: Performance Evaluation
subtitle: Evaluate and review employee performance
content: Understand the process of conducting performance evaluations for employees and providing constructive feedback.

title: Employee Benefits
subtitle: Explore available benefits and perks
content: Discover the range of benefits and perks offered to employees, including health insurance, retirement plans, and more.
